document_data.name: ''Amulet of Lost Voices''
document_data.location: [[Temple of Jergal (Sword Coast)|Temple of Jergal]], [[Sword Coast]]
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''amulet of lost voices''''' allowed one to commune with the dead.

{{Quote|The dead hold no secrets from [[Jergal]]'s [[Scriveners of Doom]].}}
document_data.Description: The amulet featured the [[holy symbol]] of [[Jergal]] set upon a beaded chain.
document_data.Powers:
The amulet granted its wearer with the power to ''[[speak with dead|converse with the dead]]'' multiple times each day and ask a handful of questions of their subject. This power would only work when directed at the remains of intelligent creatures that were recently deceased.

Interestingly enough, the recently deceased often refused to have conversations with their killers.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, one ''amulet of lost voices'' was found interred with the [[undead]] being known as [[Withers]].
